Veterans deserve the same options & convenience in scheduling doctor visits that people have in private sector dr. offices across the U.S.

More veterans will have access to quality care and problem VA employees will be more easily terminated under the VA reform bill passed today

I encourage President Obama to continue to proactively reach out to Members of Congress and articulate how those options develop.
That said, I understand that the situation remains fluid and that other options for dealing with Syria are evolving.
I remain deeply concerned that the use of military force in #Syria at this time could have serious negative consequences for our country.
Between classified briefings and today's meetings, what I’ve learned about the Administration’s plans has not quelled my doubts.
Although questions remain, I appreciate the Administration for reaching out to Congress with information on the fluid situation with #Syria.
Just left WH meeting w/ VP Biden about latest on Syria. Situation is fluid to say the least. Now back for HASC hearing w/ Secs Kerry, Hagel

Good morning! Was asked to come to a meeting at the White House this a.m. w/ VP Biden re: Syria. Eager to hear more about the admin's plan.
Productive & useful briefings today re: Syria. Look forward to House Armed Services hearing w/ Secs Kerry & Hagel, Gen Dempsey tomorrow
It’s also important that I hear from you – your views, concerns, thoughts regarding our country’s actions moving forward.
As we weigh this grave decision, I believe seeing the intelligence and proposed plan will help me make the most informed judgment possible.
I’ll be taking part in classified briefings & hearings aimed to help paint a full picture of the Syria situation.
